page.title: 05GARDEN CENTRES, WINGERWORTH
page.content: Most people in Wingerworth have a large garden to look after. They want their gardens to be attractive, tidy and productive so they usually plant a selection of fruit,flowers, vegetables and trees, as well as keeping an area of lawn to sit or play on. {Gardening}is a major hobby for many people of all ages. They spend a long time out side, throughout the year, in order to make their own unique garden. There are 2 garden centres in Wingerworth;{Broomhead Nursery}on Longedge Lane and{Wingerworth Garden {Centre}on Birkin Lane. The local gardeners can buy all their plants, seeds, tools, fertilisers etc. They try to attract more families there by selling pictures, garden furniture, jewellery, pottery, cuddley toys, sweets and toiletries.
